roleset.name: hang over
roleset.note: OVERHANG-V NOTES: Frames file for 'overhang' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 47.8. (from overhang.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: sufficient demonstration
example.text: The refunding issue, which had been in the wings for two months, was one of the chief offerings overhanging the market and limiting price appreciation.
